description: Radicale lightweight CalDAV and CardDAV Server

instructions.start: Radicale is a small but powerful CalDAV (calendars, to-do lists) and CardDAV (contacts) server. Please create your config at /etc/radicale/config/ following the Authentication chapter of the 5-min setup at https://radicale.org/3.0.html#tutorials/basic-configuration and deploy.
instructions.end: Radicale is deployed and available as $$cap_appname.
